description.ko: 암석, 토양, 퇴적물을 통해 대지의 서사를 보여주며 지구의 질감과 지질학적 역사를 상세히 탐구합니다.
description.en: A detailed study of earth textures and geological history, showcasing the narrative of land through rock, soil, and sediment.

prompt: A macro-topographic cross-section of an ancient tectonic fault line, revealing jagged layers of #8B4513 obsidian, #D2691E red clay, and #F4A460 crystalline quartz veins. Detailed textures of parched soil and sediment layers carved by eons of geological pressure. 8k resolution, hyper-realistic. Side lighting from the golden hour mimics a low-angled sun, casting long, dramatic shadows across #2F4F4F bedrock, telling the narrative of a land carved by time and raw mineral pressure.
